text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf and I are on our way<n>back from a
day out.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's hard to believe the day is over<n>already. Time
truly does fly when you're<n>having fun...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I had a wonderful time, but that has<n>been enough
enjoyment for one day. I<n>ought to get ready to
for tomorrow's<n>cla—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In that moment, something in the<n>supermarket
window catches Symboli<n>Rudolf's attention.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hm... Los pimientos rellenos suenan terriblemente<n>buenos...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Would you mind waiting here a moment?<n>I'm just
going to buy ingredients for<n>tomorrow's lunch.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ¿Oh? Bueno, si estás seguro, difícilmente<n>podría negarme.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for the help. I can turn these<n>into quite
the nutritious lunch tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Usually, yes. As a Tracen Academy<n>student, it's
my duty to monitor the food<n>I consume.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The food served in the cafeteria is<n>designed to
meet our nutritional needs,<n>of course...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But seeing as the student council office<n>doubles
as a place to seek advice, I<n>would prefer not to
vacate it during the<n>lunch period.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
To that end, I try to bring a packed<n>lunch to eat
there whenever I can.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hah! What an odd thing to fixate on. I<n>cannot
imagine it would be especially<n>interesting to look
at...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I would also be a little embarrassed to<n>simply waft
my lunch under your nose.<n>What do you say I
make you one too?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You help me every day. I would only be<n>returning
the favor.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Besides, cooking for one makes it<n>remarkably
difficult to avoid wasting<n>food.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I often find myself obliged to donate<n>excess
portions to Brian and Air Groove.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Speaking of which, they've told me this<n>directly,
so I'll warn you in advance...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Mis almuerzos son conocidos por verse bastante<n>simples.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Several days later, I get the chance to<n>try Symboli
Rudolf's cooking for myself.<n>It won't win any
awards for presentation,<n>but it tastes extremely
nutritious.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It can be onerous at times, but the<n>benefits are
worth the effort.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
For one thing, having a task before me<n>first thing
in the morning helps me to<n>wake up full of
purpose.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Against the temptations of slumber, I<n>levy the
shield of diligence and the<n>sword of appetite.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ...Ups.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ajaja... Eres tan perceptivo como siempre,<n>veo.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
As you correctly deduced, I'm not a<n>naturally
early riser.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I take measures to ensure that it doesn't<n>affect my
responsibilities, but there's no<n>changing my
constitution.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Naturally, this is strictly confidential<n>information.
Nobody below<n>vice-presidential level must know.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf's smile turns just a little<n>
mischievous.
